attributes.action: Award the George Cross to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The whole NHS, professional staff and volunteers , have shown dedication and bravery in the face of an invisible enemy, COVID 19. The GC was awarded to Malta during the war: the NHS is deserving of the same recognition.
attributes.background: Advise the Queen to award the George Cross to the NHS

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
